QuoteMeta.Quote: I'm unpredictable, I never know where I'm going until I get there, I'm so random, I'm always growing, learning, changing, I'm never the same person twice. But one thing you can be sure of about me; is I will always do exactly what I want to do.
QuoteMeta.Author: C. JoyBell C.

QuoteMeta.Quote: All of my best friends are dead people. Someday I've got to figure out how that happened.
QuoteMeta.Author: Claudia Gray

QuoteMeta.Quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
QuoteMeta.Author: Jimmy Dean

QuoteMeta.Quote: Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without passion.
QuoteMeta.Author: Georg Wilhelm

QuoteMeta.Quote: I'm unpredictable, I never know where I'm going until I get there, I'm so random, I'm always growing, learning, changing, I'm never the same person twice. But one thing you can be sure of about me; is I will always do exactly what I want to do.
QuoteMeta.Author: C. JoyBell C.
